name: Boruto
description: Boruto is the son of Naruto Uzimaki and is the next generation of shinobi

description: Tanjiro in the oldest of 8 children. He had to go to town to sell wood and came back home the next day to see his family was killed by a demon.

description: In a world where people have super hero powers, Deku was born with out one and became the greatest hero. Here's how he did it.

name: Bleach

name: Attack on Titans
description: Humans must survive the world apocolpse.

description: A multigenerational tale of the heroic Joestar family and their never-ending battle against evil!

name: One-Punch Man
description: Life gets pretty boring when you can beat the snot out of any villain with just one punch.

description: Goku's adventure from the best-selling manga Dragon Ball continues!

description: When Light Yagami finds a notebook giving him power over death, will he use it for goodâ€”or evil?
